name: Ludum Dare 45 jam
description:
What? When you open the game, you find that you can’t do anything? Try creating a txt called “right” ,and dragging it into the game window now you can control it. Start with nothing,Including operation. Use this mechanism flexibly，and enjoy this platform jumping decryption game

If you’re blocked by a scene，Welcome to leave me a message in the comments，and I will give you more tips.

PS： game name is kamenrider 01. A JUMP TO THE SKY TURNS TO A RIDERKICK !

Controls:

AD - Move left and right Space - Jump Drag the txt file into the game window，the txt’s name is your ability.
